name: MB Impex
overview:
M.B. Impex was established in the year 2005 as sole proprietorship unit. The idea was to supply quality products at an affordable price. In the process to achieve the goal, we have been very calculative in our approach. This belief has helped us and today we are counted among the leading manufacturer, supplier and exporter of Ladies Tunics, Ladies Skrits, Ladies Shirts, Ladies Blouses, Ladies Trousers, Ladies Stoles, Ladies Shorts, Ladies Pareos, Ladies Kurtis, Ladies Jackets, Ladies Tops, Kids Wear, Made Ups, Bed Linens, Designer Curtains, Cushion Covers and Table Linens.

Our Aim: We Provide Quality Merchandise to Foreign Buyers We Maintain Stipulated Delivery Schedule Prime Goal-Customer Satisfaction Communication Efficiency–Prompt Responses We are Quality Conscious

Our Quality: We work in line with best of quality standards, the entire production process is mapped and quality control measures are applied at each step, so that there is nothing, which escapes through our watchful eyes. Considering the demand for highest quality standards we constant update ourselves with the prevalent market norms, thus enabling us to sustain the competition and scale new heights.

Our Team: Team is one the major factors which contribute in our success. We have a highly experienced set of professionals who follow a very dedicated approach in the work assigned to them. The team composition consists of tailors, weavers quality controllers who work on a carefully mapped production plan, ensuring optimum results.

Our Customers: ANTIK BATIK, FRANCE AGATHE DI FILLIPI, FRANCE DESIGN POD, UK JEFFERSON GMBH, GERMANY NON–STOP, GERMANY GUL EXPORT CORPORATION, ITALY MATUSDA TRADING CO LTD, JAPAN
